languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Данный язык является специфическим жаргоном, используемым, скорее всего, лишь экипажем данного судна. Данной единице он интуитивно знаком, но не понятен".
"This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Данный язык является специфическим жаргоном, используемым, скорее всего, лишь экипажем данного судна. Данной единице он интуитивно знаком, но не понятен".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive lingo whose use is most likely limited to this ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この声明は誤りです。この専門語は今はなき方言であり、ほぼ間違いなくこの船の乗務員しか話さないものです。このユニットにとっては本能的に親しみあるものですが、明瞭さには欠ける」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は誤りです。この専門語は今はなき方言であり、ほぼ間違いなくこの船の乗務員しか話さないものです。このユニットにとっては本能的に親しみあるものですが、明瞭さには欠ける」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。这种语言是一种独特的方言，很可能只有这艘船的船员会使用。本单位虽然直觉上对此感到熟悉，但理解起来有困难。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。这种语言是一种独特的方言，很可能只有这艘船的船员会使用。本单位虽然直觉上对此感到熟悉，但理解起来有困难。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Ce dialecte est une langue vernaculaire distincte, probablement unique à l'équipage de ce vaisseau. Bien que familière à cette unité, elle n'est pas intelligible. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Ce dialecte est une langue vernaculaire distincte, probablement unique à l'équipage de ce vaisseau. Bien que familière à cette unité, elle n'est pas intelligible. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Lo más probable es que este idioma solo lo use la tripulación de esta nave. Esta unidad lo reconoce, pero no lo comprende».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Lo más probable es que este idioma solo lo use la tripulación de esta nave. Esta unidad lo reconoce, pero no lo comprende».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Es handelt sich um charakteristischen Regiolekt, der vermutlich nur von der Crew des Schiffs verwendet wird. Er ist für diese Einheit intuitiv vertraut, aber nicht verständlich."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Es handelt sich um charakteristischen Regiolekt, der vermutlich nur von der Crew des Schiffs verwendet wird. Er ist für diese Einheit intuitiv vertraut, aber nicht verständlich."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Bu diyalektin kendine has tarzı, muhtemelen yalnızca bu geminin mürettebatı tarafından kullanılmakta. Bu birim, söylenenleri sezebilse de anlamlandıramıyor."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The idiom is a distinctive vernacular most likely only used by the ship's crew. It is intuitively familiar to this unit, but not intelligible."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Bu diyalektin kendine has tarzı muhtemelen yalnızca bu geminin mürettebatı tarafından kullanılmakta. Söylenenler bu birim için sezilebilir ancak anlamlandırılabilir değil."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
